title: broadcast Event
description: An event message from the Desktop Agent to an app indicating that context has been broadcast on a channel it is listening to, or specifically to this app instance if it was launched via `fdc3.open` and context was passed.

channelId.title: channel Id
channelId.description: The Id of the channel that the broadcast was sent on. May be `null` if the context is being broadcast due to a call `fdc3.open` that passed context.

context.title: Context
context.description: The context object that was broadcast.

originatingApp.title: Originating AppIdentifier
originatingApp.description: Details of the application instance that broadcast the context.
